Summary: Silver cylinder, rose, fell and flew northeast of Hwy 24 15 miles east Hill City
divs: sighting detailsmy friend and i (ages 55) driving west on hwy 24 about 15 miles east of hill city briefly saw a large silver cylinder about 1\3 mile ahead west above the highway, rise and fall and fly north east about about 50 miles per hhour at about 50 feet above ground. it appeared to be a cylinder about the size of a 747 fuselage, but wider in girth and it was a hollow-looking cylinder with no wings, no windows, and no visible propulsion engines. my friend and i described it separately, rather confirming each others interpretation. it left no trail. it was travelling probably 50 miles per hour. this was friday, june 22 at about 2 pm central time, 2007. it was a cloudless sky, however we could see the craft only briefly between hills from the road. i sighted it first for about 8 seconds, and asked my friend to observe it while i drove, he also saw it for about 10 seconds before it disappeared behind hills. i would estimate
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hill City
This sighting has never been favorited.
